sources.title: Tarim
sources.content:
Tarim may refer to:

Tarim, Yemen, a city in Yemen
Tarim District, Yemen
Tarim River, China
Tarim Basin, China
Tarim mummies, a series of mummies which have been excavated at Niya, an oasis in the Tarim Basin
Tarim, the monotheistic god worshiped by multiple religions in Dave Sim's Cerebus the Aardvark graphic novel series

See also
Tarin (disambiguation)
sources.summary:

sources.title: Tarim
sources.content:
Tarim est une ville du Yémen de la vallée du Hadramaout ;
Le Tarim est un cours d'eau de Chine : voir bassin du Tarim.
sources.summary:
Tarim est une ville du Yémen de la vallée du Hadramaout ;
Le Tarim est un cours d'eau de Chine : voir bassin du Tarim.

sources.content:
## China
Tarim (China) — A region in China.

## Yemen
Tarim (Yemen) — A town in Yemen.
